body:
Hate to be a partypooper but cmon guys.
Talk bout lax and lazy plot.
Saimin hypno or clockstop App?
Enough of this shit.
I swear it one of these days a "genius" otaku is gonna try that shit on real world and gonna get da living crap beaten out of him recorded 4 the whole world 2 see.
If the beating wont kill him being a Jap hell surely will suicide.
Serves you all right.
Wanna do hypno crappy plot?
Do it properly like good old decade.
Beat a girl or blackmail deceive her.
Imprison her then use drugs love potions a pendulum a sextans a laser whatever device but dont gimme that gained app bullshit or alien magic super powers.
Heck even Sebastian or Skinner the hollow inviso men had to put some effort to obtain the means to rape gals.
It didnt just happened to fall on their laps out of the blue.
Stop being so laidback bums and bitch about it with the makers of that shit.
Grow up some backbone.
Arent we men?
So act like one.
naisu.. good endings alwas bring a tear to my eye
Don’t know if a translation out there but this is the sequel to 275038
what is the part 1 of this ?
Hate to break it to the Translator but, 3 girls +1 male = a 4-way
This feels like a sequel, where is the first part?
@How Dull The guy has its hypnosis device out in his hands and will most likely hypnotise the guy again. problem solved.
holy shit mans wrote a whole essay for the title
That time I got a mind control device and I'm gonna fuck his wife and daughter in front of him
NTR ok.  But, Mind Control.. skip..
There's quite a lot of good doujins today
Oh don't you dare start Weeb War 1562856 here im tired of seeing shit like comparing ntr and vanilla you read what you like. your shit im shit everybody's shit so stop it get some help.
Hentai titles are starting to become like light novel titles lmao
